finalizeHitTypeValues(uint256,uint256).return: list of seven values to determine final values of attacks in Betting module

devdoc.title: This contract is responsible to generate the final random number for use in selecting the actual final values within the table values to be assigned to the final attack list for any specific game instance in GameManager. and maintains a list of Game ID to random seed input combinations.

assignHighValues(uint256,uint256).notice: randomly assign values to Hard Punch[301-400], Hard Kick[401-500], and Hard Thunder[501-600] hit types

assignLowValues(uint256,uint256).notice: randomly assign values to Low Punch[1-100], Low Kick[101-200], and Low Thunder[201-300] hit types

assignSlashValue(uint256,uint256).notice: randomly assign values to the slash type which can be either high [601-700] or low result [1-100] ranges

calculateCurrentRandom(uint256,uint256).notice: combine random input from bets with previous combined output (currentRandom number) of sepcific GAMEID

calculateFinalBlockedAttacksPointsHighVa.notice: calculate the total points of blocked attacks in the range of high value attack types for the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

calculateFinalBlockedAttacksPointsLowVal.notice: calculate the total points of blocked attacks in the range of low value attack types for the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

calculateFinalDirectAttacksPointsHighVal.notice: calculate the total points of direct attacks in the range of high value attack types for the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

calculateFinalDirectAttacksPointsLowValu.notice: calculate the total points of direct attacks in the range of low value attack types for the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

calculateFinalPoints(uint256,address,uin.notice: calculate the final points of all attacks for the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

finalizeHitTypeValues(uint256,uint256).notice: randomly chooses set of values to hitTypes of sepcific GAMEID

multiBlockRandomGen(uint256,uint256).notice: generates a number from 0 to 2^n based on the last n blocks and seed

randomGen(uint256).notice: generates a random number from 0 to 100 based on the last block hash, blocktime, block difficulty, and seed
